sentences.sContent: They only have the most superficial understanding of prison life.
sentences.sCn: 他们对监狱生活只有最粗浅的了解。

sentences.sContent: Beneath his refined manners and superficial elegance lay something treacherous.
sentences.sCn: 在他温文尔雅、貌似高贵的举止下隐藏着某种奸诈。

synos.tran: 表面文章；外表；浅薄的人

remMethod.val: super(上)+fic(面)+i+al→在上面做的→表面的

words.tran: 浅薄，肤浅；表面性的事物

trans.tranOther: not studying or looking at something carefully and only seeing the most noticeable things
